description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Make your way past several stages into the heart of the crypt to find and destroy an ancient vampire.  An old school platformer filled with deadly traps, jumps, puzzles, and secrets, along with the vampire's countless evil minions.  But beating the game is only half the battle.  You'll need to explore and use your wits to find all of the relics for the true ending.
